#summary List of versions of ChBoSync published in Google's app store
#labels versions

In the following table the versions of ChBoSync published in Google's app store are listed:

|| *Version* || *Date* || *Tag in SVN repository* ||
|| 1.0       ||        ||                         ||
|| ...       ||        ||                         ||


In the column _"Tag in SVN repository"_ you'll find the name of the tag which represents a snapshot of the app's source code in the Subversion repository for the build that was released in the app store. For all tags see _[https://code.google.com/p/chbosync4android/source/browse/#svn%2Ftags  this folder]_ in the Subversion repository.
